name: Bacon, Beef, and Fennel Stew
notes: You can do this in a slow cooker or stovetop if you don’t have a pressure cooker.
Original quantities are from leftovers and things on sale, feel free to modify
I served with brown rice. You could also drop the cooking time to ~12 minutes, add a sturdy grain such as barley or farro, and cook on low pressure for an additional 4 minutes.
steps: Add oil to instant pot, add meat, season with salt and pepper, and brown on all sides
Add onions and garlic to pot, cook for a minute or two more
Deglaze with wine, simmer until the alcohol evaporates
Add the remaining ingredients and mix
Cook on high pressure for 15 minutes
